dc_title_s: Infrastructure Report Geodatabase - Impacted State forest roads as of December 2012: Pennsylvania
dc_description_s: State forest roads impacted by shale gas development as of December 31, 2012. This dataset was used in part to develop the Bureau of Forestrys Shale Gas Monitoring Report (released April 2014). This data represents primarily State Forest managed roads impacted by shale gas development as of 12/31/2012. This data was based on the best available information at the time and may contain errors or omissions. April 2014 Shale Gas Monitoring Report Infrastructure
dc_creator_sm: Pennsylvania Department of Conservation and Natural Resources
